emuInput.TitMainTitle: Portrait of groom Howard U. Prentiss, fourth on left, and bride Toni Howell Prentiss, standing with wedding party including Marilyn Lee, Shelia Howell, Gloria Toogood, and Sarah Boyd; William Toogood, Sonny Williams, Muncey Williams, and Barney Pettigrew, standing in yard with wooden fence at home of Mr. and Mrs. Jack Howell, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 4, 1962, pg. 9 reads:"Mr. And Mrs. Howard U. Prentiss...Harris photo" Portion of accompanying article reads: "Miss Toni Howell, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Jack Howell was a beautiful bride as she pledged her troth to Howard U. Prentiss, of Washington, D.C.  The happy pair repeated vows before Rev. James C. Cayce of Ebenezer Baptist Church.  The ceremony was enchanting, held in prettily decorated garden of the bride's home..."
